channel.title: [simple tut] for new html coders
channel.description:
this is the first tut i ever made in my life.....but im still young so its not so long...well...this is mainly the basics....advanced html coders dont really need to look at this but if this was posted before please just tell me with a simple "this was posted before" reply thanks for the start of html coding u have the website itself as a blank page the head has to do with the title etc. any title that will be displayed as like title - firefox at the top the body tag is where almost all of the web content goes all the content the public will be reading and watching and stuff this is where it will be going

any content u wanna show in ur website example of a table would be

is for paragraph you dont really need it but some people use it for being neat you also dont need to add an ending tag to it
anything here in a column another column have as many as u want
for a background color u can put this into body so it would be like example: for a link or for the whole page's text u can make it look like this well for the link i put the original colors blue and purple link is for the link color of course vlink stands for visited link which is originally purple bgcolor if u didnt know stands for background color and alink is for active link which i think is also blue now since this is too basic im going to add the link making and adding.... in the body section u can add links to ur website for fun or for important things doesnt matter a link in the body section would look like this then the content u would like to put for it then the closing tag...walla u have a link! now ill just be saying how to make writing bold and italic....like i said basic... so in front of the writing or content u would put in front for bold and to end it so if u would be writing a bold paragraph it would look like

whatever u want to write

now thats the write way do NOT do it this way

whatever u want here

this would be the WRONG way now to make it italic its exactly the same thing as bold except with an i so it would look like.... and closing now i forgot to add breaking and creating new lines before but im going to add it now at the end of each line if u would like to break the sentence i mean as "end" ur sentence the tag would be
....simple.... so an example would be:

any content


yes its that simple....now add as many
as u want it will make it so theres more space between ur sentences well i hope that helped some beginner html coders with the basics thanks for noticing that people

item.title: [simple tut] for new html coders
item.dc:creator: @Exernet Exernet
item.description:
@Exernet wrote:

The head tag doesn’t deal with just the title tag… It displays/loads stuff before the page (body) is displayed.

Read full topic

item.title: [simple tut] for new html coders
item.dc:creator: @knight knight
item.description:
@knight wrote:

ok added it thanks for telling me

Read full topic

item.title: [simple tut] for new html coders
item.dc:creator: @SSPAC SSPAC
item.description:
@SSPAC wrote:

Wow, dude, lol…You could really add some more stuff, that is sooooo basic. Tell a little about how to change font color, style etc, and what and body does. Also, you just plainly wrote in the body section. Add the tag

and

(paragraph) when you are typing words.

Read full topic

item.title: [simple tut] for new html coders
item.dc:creator: @Exernet Exernet
item.description:
@Exernet wrote:

You forgot to explain what the head tag does ;), but good job… Beginners should find it useful.

Read full topic

item.title: [simple tut] for new html coders
item.dc:creator: @knight knight
item.description:
@knight wrote:

this is the first tut i ever made in my life…but im still young so its not so long…well…this is mainly the basics…advanced html coders dont really need to look at this but if this was posted before please just tell me with a simple “this was posted before” reply

thanks

for the start of html coding u have the website itself as a blank page

the head has to do with the title etc. any title that will be displayed as like title - firefox at the top the body tag is where almost all of the web content goes all the content the public will be reading and watching and stuff this is where it will be going

any content u wanna show in ur website

example of a table would be

is for paragraph you dont really need it but some people use it for being neat you also dont need to add an ending tag to it

anything here in a column another column have as many as u want

for a background color u can put this into body so it would be like
example:

for a link or for the whole page’s text u can make it look like this

well for the link i put the original colors blue and purple link is for the link color of course vlink stands for visited link which is originally purple bgcolor if u didnt know stands for background color and alink is for active link which i think is also blue

now since this is too basic im going to add the link making and adding…

in the body section u can add links to ur website for fun or for important things doesnt matter

a link in the body section would look like this

then the content u would like to put for it then the closing tag…walla u have a link!

now ill just be saying how to make writing bold and italic…like i said basic…
so in front of the writing or content u would put in front for bold and to end it

so if u would be writing a bold paragraph it would look like

whatever u want to write

now thats the write way do NOT do it this way

whatever u want here

this would be the WRONG way

now to make it italic its exactly the same thing as bold except with an i so it would look like… and closing

now i forgot to add breaking and creating new lines before but im going to add it now

at the end of each line if u would like to break the sentence i mean as “end” ur sentence the tag would be
…simple…

so an example would be:

any content


yes its that simple....now add as many
as u want it will make it so theres more space between ur sentences

well i hope that helped some beginner html coders with the basics

thanks for noticing that people
